enigma_edit.lua.data

Class FieldReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • enigma_edit.lua.data.Data
      • enigma_edit.lua.data.SourceData
        • enigma_edit.lua.data.FieldReference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Assignable, Dereferencable, Source, Typed
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TilePart.Ref

    public class FieldReference
extends SourceData
implements Assignable
    This is a special Reference that points to a member of a table. It can even reference non existing table entries, to allow the creation of them through the assign(Source, CodeSnippet, Mode) method.

      • typename

        public java.lang.String typename(Mode2 mode)
        Description copied from interface: Typed
        Returns the type of the value represented by this object in human readable form. If this instance is a value already, the result is the same as for Typed.typename(). Otherwise this is either a multi-mode value or a reference, in which case the type of the underlying instance will be returned.
        Specified by:
        typename in interface Dereferencable
        Specified by:
        typename in interface Typed
        Overrides:
        typename in class SourceData
        Parameters:
        mode - Mode to fetch the type for.
        Returns:
        The type-name of the underlying value.
